sentences.sentence: His to-do list was dispiritingly inadequate on some of the thorniest problems.
sentences.translation: 在一些最棘手的问题上，他的待办事项清单令人沮丧地不足。

sentences.sentence: Testing performance is one of the thorniest areas of unit testing.
sentences.translation: 测试性能是单元测试最为痛苦的方面之一。

sentences.sentence: This has become one of the thorniest issues in the REDD negotiations.
sentences.translation: 这成为在REDD谈判中的最棘手的问题之一。
